law.catch_line: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Enterprise" means a business entity proposing to carry on a business in the State that meets the requirements of § 5-526 of this subtitle.

text.section: "Equity participation financing" includes investment or guaranty of investment in an enterprise.
"Existing business" means a business whose board of directors or owners approve the sale of the business to an enterprise receiving equity participation financing.

section.section: "Franchise" has the meaning stated in § 14-201 of the Business Regulation Article.
"Franchise" includes only franchise offerings that are registered or exempt under the Maryland Franchise Registration and Disclosure Law.

text.section: "Fund" means the Equity Participation Investment Program Fund.
"Program" means the Equity Participation Investment Program.
"Technology-based business" means a commercial or industrial enterprise engaged in the application of scientific knowledge to practical purposes in a particular field for a profit.
